topics.body: Hell after Cockroach's introduction and thorough ass-kicking, Arachnid decides to tie her up and take her back to her apartment for questioning. Unfortunately Arachnid falls asleep. And it turns out that Cockroach can excrete a slime that helps her get loose from her bindings. And instead of doing her job and killing Arachnid, [spoiler]Cockroach decides to sneak in to her room and star smelling Arachnid's panties.[/spoiler]
